CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 5 shows the typical output and transfer curves of a representative device with PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) as the channel semiconductor.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTDPP(Bu) |

The entity "PDTP" is not clearly referring to a material name, it could be a typo or an abbreviation that is not explicitly mentioned in the paragraph, therefore it's not included in the table.

The entity "PDTP" is not a material property and has been removed from the table.

This is the name of the channel semiconductor material used in the representative device, and it is presented as a combination of two acronyms separated by a hyphen.
